## Outline

Where do your projects live and can you manage them?
`https://github.com/your-account`

* Where do your projects' pages live and how can you create them easily?
`https://your-account.github.io`

* When `your-account` isn't enough and is best to have `your-organization`?





# Repositories (projects) | `https://github.com/username/repository`

* Create new repository.
* Make private/public.
* Create a simple page via README.
* Delete repository.
* [Get unlimited private repos](https://education.github.com/discount_requests/new).

# Collaborating

* Who can and can't edit?

## Who can edit?: Example

* maurolepore can edit https://github.com/maurolepore/abc/
* forestgeoguest can't edit yet.
* maurolepore invites forestgeoguest.
* forestgeoguest accepts .../maurolepore/abc/invitations
* forestgeoguest can edit but can't control settings.
